name: You Picked the Wrong Dungeon
description:
Can you survive the dungeon?

This game was made in under one week for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 Game Jam. The Theme was Rewind. As you play, you must rewind your character's abilities. Pick and choose what abilities you can live without as you dive deeper into the abyss. Can you master the mechanics and the dungeon or will you succumb to the darkness?

A game by Ian Campbell.
